entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - EDGAR/transform

[DQC.US.0204.10706] The concept us-gaap:PropertyPlantAndEquipmentGross with a value of 100,399,000 has been used with the axis PropertyPlantAndEquipmentByTypeAxis and the member us-gaap:ComputerSoftwareIntangibleAssetMember. The member us-gaap:ComputerSoftwareIntangibleAssetMember should not be used with the PropertyPlantAndEquipmentByTypeAxis as it is expected to represent an intangible asset. Please change the member to represent an tangible asset or change the axis to represent an intangible asset. i.e. FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsByMajorClassAxis or IndefiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsByMajorClassAxis.
Concept : us-gaap:PropertyPlantAndEquipmentGross Value : 100,399,000 Period : 2024-09-30 Dimensions : us-gaap:PropertyPlantAndEquipmentByTypeAxis=us-gaap:ComputerSoftwareIntangibleAssetMember
Rule Element Id:10706 Rule version: 27.0.0RC1 - prth-20240930.htm 8

The member us-gaap:ComputerSoftwareIntangibleAssetMember should not be used with the PropertyPlantAndEquipmentByTypeAxis as it is expected to represent an intangible asset. Please change the member to represent an tangible asset or change the axis to represent an intangible asset. i.e. FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsByMajorClassAxis or IndefiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsByMajorClassAxis.
